channel.title: How to change the default ip in client?
channel.description: Ok I just finished my server and I got the client for it and now all I need to do is switch the default ip in the client to my servers ip. Does any1 know how to do that and can tell me how??

item.title: How to change the default ip in client?
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

GUI.Java EGUI.Java or Client.Java and search “ip” and in most clients it should say 127.0.0.1 beside it. Just change to yours.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the default ip in client?

item.title: How to change the default ip in client?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

S E R B:

Ok I just finished my server and I got the client for it and now all I need to do is switch the default ip in the client to my servers ip. Does any1 know how to do that and can tell me how??

EGUI.java, should be in there, or GUI.java, or Client.java.
